original_title: Vadivel Suresh ousted from SJB organizer post over budget vote
original_body_lines: Samagi Jana Balavegaya (SJB) Parliamentarian Vadivel Suresh has reportedly been removed from his position as the SJB’s Passara Organiser.
The decision has reportedly been taken in the wake of the Parliamentarian voting in favour during the vote on the second reading of the 2024 Budget.
Commenting in this regard, MP Vadivel Suresh stated that the youth of Passara area will receive a great hope in politics in the near future.
Meanwhile, Letchuman Sanjay has been appointed to the vacant position of SJB organiser for the Passara electorate.
Sanjay has obtained the letter of appointment from the Party’s Leader, Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa, as per sources.
